products.title: Origin, Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as completely versatile, matching a wide range of styles and colour schemes. Insert the porcelain grey fine grain into a light decor scheme for a lounge, furnishing the room with white painted wickers, luxe grey fabrics, and minimal metal.

products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in devon cream fine grain displays a chalky cream finish, with grain detailing, on wide faux wood slats, complete with a matching pelmet, rails, and control cords. Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder. Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey.

products.title: Ecowood, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The flawless finish of the ecowood in devon cream satin is given by the satin-matt cream paint used to coat the hardwearing faux wood slats. For adjustable light, ventilation, and privacy, simply move and tilt the slats to suit your needs. Insert the devon cream satin into a natural and light decor scheme, furnishing the room with bare and painted wickers, unfinished woods, and organic hessians. Paint the walls in cream or oatmeal and include a large jute rug for added rural flair.

products.title: Ecowood, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there's the added bonus of moisture-resistance and strong durability. Team the blizzard grey fine grain with a monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary living room. Stick to pure white walls and add in furniture in varying tones of black and grey, throwing in some plush fabrics to counteract the hard lines and colours.

products.title: Ecowood, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Convincingly textured to produce the look and feel of genuine wood, the ecowood in country fine grain is in fact formed from hardwearing pvc. This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resistant, making it an ideal choice for a family bathroom or kitchen. Go all-out outdoorsy in your living room by partnering the country fine grain with forest and grass greens and natural, organic browns.

products.title: Ecowood, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In true french style, the ecowood in chateau fine grain has a demure, understated tone, making it ideal for homely, vintage feel. Matching rails and control cords provide complete colour coordination, so that you can be sure that nothing will distract from this pretty, faux wood blind. Incorporate the chateau fine grain into a romantically styled bathroom, where the tiling is a creamy off-white and the walls are painted in pale vintage pink.

products.title: Ecowood, Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With all of the neat good looks of wood and functional practicality of a venetian, the ecowood in espresso fine grain displays a dark brown wood effect on hardwearing slats. This quality faux wood is water-resistant and won't crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Influence your kitchen with a soft monochrome scheme, going for brown or soft black worktops similar to the espresso fine grain and creamy off-white units.

products.title: Ecowood, Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a dark mahogany tone, and a grained finish, the ecowood in fruitwood fine grain has a truly authentic look and feel, belying its pvc material. This durable, long-lasting blind is water-resistant so you can be sure that it won't warp or crack. Merge the fruitwood fine grain with duck egg blue walls in a traditionally styled living room. Incorporate polished wood furnishings and matching duck egg accessories, adding in a hint of teal for a quick burst of bold colouring.

products.title: Ecowood, Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a light, orange-toned wood effect, the ecowood in provincial fine grain has a warm and cosy finish, with natural-looking wood grain texturing to give a feeling of true authenticity. Matching accessories, including a pelmet, bottom rail, and control cords, finish the look with ease. For a snug and homely ambience in the dining room, set the provincial fine grain against a mediterranean red, furnishing the room with matching woods in light and medium tones.

products.title: Spectrum, Light Pearl - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coordinating cords and rails that blend perfectly with the rest of the blind. Harmonise with a creamy white colour scheme in the bathroom or kitchen, where the wipe-clean slats will come in extra handy.

products.title: Spectrum, Almond - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get plenty of use. Tame brightly patterned wallpapers in the kids' bedroom or playroom, where durability and sturdiness are a must. Or for a sophisticated look in the living room, team with a deep burgundy to promote a cosy and homely feel that you won't want to be away from.

products.title: Spectrum, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. Use the dove grey as part of a white colour scheme in the bathroom, for something just a little darker, or use as a neutral to temper bold reds, rich plums, or dark greys in the living room or dining room.

products.title: Ecowood, Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in driftwood fine grain is a prettily textured piece in a light, natural wood tone, and with a realistic wood look. A practical and hardwearing blind that's simple and easy to use, it will look pretty and natural wherever it's placed. Create a simple yet elegantly organic scheme in a dining room by including naked woods and artisan fabrics as well as the lovely driftwood fine grain. Go for stark white walls and plenty of plant-life, adding bamboo accessories to add to the look.

products.title: Wow Factor, Brushed Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Sophisticated and discreet, the wow factor in brushed oyster is a classic brushed gold that combines class and subtlety. Crafted from durable, heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easy to tilt and move about, this is a blind that is built to last - in quality and style. For subdued glamour, use with dark navy blues, deep purples, or rich burgundys, accenting occasionally with pretty creams. These would all make flexible colour schemes, perfect in many rooms, including the living room, dining room, and master bedroom.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Vista, Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none of the daintiness, using a durable, heavy gauge aluminium to form its narrow, adjustable slats, which are perforated to let the light softly filter through. Place the magnolia in your kitchen, where it is functional and wipe-clean, and group with mocha browns and brushed silvers.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love rich, biscuity cream tones, then you'll adore the penthouse fine grain from the ecowood deluxe range. Wide slats, with a grain-texture finish, are backed by linen tapes to adjust and tilt the blind, giving a coordinated and designer look. Mix the penthouse fine grain with the lush hues of coffee and chocolate for a classic cookies and cream look. Use this colour scheme to craft and unusual yet striking kitchen look, where cosiness will be the word of the day.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In true ecowood deluxe style, the range's castle grey fine grain offers true designer chic. With a satin-like feel and authentic-style grain detail, this faux wood blind is as gorgeous as it is practical. Designer ribbons adorn the back for easy adjusting. Pair the soft grey of the castle grey fine grain with the bold and stark tone of a pure ribbon red for an unforgettable look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: For top quality designer vogue, opt for the ecowood deluxe's devon cream fine grain, a thick-slatted venetian blind with a sleek, matt finish and gentle grain detail. Coordinating accessories finish the look, including chic linen ladder tapes that back the blind. For a modern yet classical vibe in a bedroom, sit the devon cream fine grain against a navy blue feature wall. Dress the bed with matching navy bedlinen, in fresh cottons, and adorn with plush, cream chenille cushions.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood deluxe in chic grey fine grain brings an air of sophistication wherever it goes - or hangs. A deep shade of grey, it displays a classic wood grain works wonderfully on its faux wood slats. Linen ribbon tapes add a designer touch that just can't be beaten in terms of style. Opt for a bold look in your kitchen by pairing the chic grey fine grain with jet black and ruby red. Choose sleek black and grey units and worktops, adding in red in the form of utensils and crockery, and making silver your accent colour of choice.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Build a stunning window arrangement that's both stylish and practical with the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey fine grain. This sleek collection of quality louvres creates a contemporary venetian blind made from convincing faux wood that's both moisture-resistant and has the ability to be adapted to any surrounding. Craft a chic ambience in your bedroom by hanging the blizzard grey fine grain amidst pastel pink walls and bedlinen.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an enchanting window arrangement, choose the ecowood deluxe in devon cream satin for its hardwearing faux wood and quality craftsmanship. This popular choice, with matching supports and decorative, designer detailing, generates a contemporary, venetian-style blind with quick and easy installation and valuable moisture-resistance. Generate a sophisticated restroom with peaceful shading by hanging the devon cream satin against a contemporary, dove grey surrounding.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With its ash-like looks and grainy texture, the ecowood deluxe in driftwood fine grain has the authentic look and feel of real wood. The faux wood it's made of is high quality, moisture-resistant, and forms sleek, attractive slats, venetian style. Because wood goes with anything, the driftwood fine grain is one of the most versatile blinds around when it comes to looks. Use it with similarly toned woods in a light and airy kitchen, throwing in your favourite colour as an accent.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Gently textured to imitate genuine wood, the ecowood deluxe in country fine grain gives a quality impression of the real thing. All this despite being made from faux wood pvc, which makes it hardwearing and water-resistant. Do as it says on the tin and use the country fine grain as part of a rural, country theme in the kitchen. Opt for rustic shades of terracotta, sage green, and sky blue for the tiling, and choose units in a similar light wood.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plump for all-out vintage style with the ecowood deluxe range's chateau fine grain, a beautifully stained, faux wood blind offering all of the flair and functionality of a venetian. The design is formed from top quality elements, with heavy duty headrails to ensure total security. Bring some authentic french styling to the master bedroom, surrounding the chateau fine grain with varying shades of cream and ivory.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a dark brown colouring and authentic-looking wood grain, the ecowood deluxe's espresso fine grain is an attractive luxury blind. Designer-style woven ladder tapes finish off this handsome look with streamlined chic. Team the brown of the espresso fine grain with a muted terracotta for an unusual yet striking look in a contemporary living room. Go for white walls, adorning them with funky wall prints in matching blacks and burnt oranges.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: It would be simple to create an elegant dcor with the ecowood deluxe in provincial fine grain, due to its natural, honeyed tone and authentic appearance. The hardwearing and water-resistant faux wood used to form this practical, venetian-style blind produces a pleasant window dressing that is full of hidden benefits. Showcase the provincial fine grain in your lounge with sun-kissed, lumber flooring and toned furnishings to fashion a coordinated arrangement with authentic features.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Create an authentic window dressing that is long-lasting and water-resistant with the ecowood deluxe in fruitwood fine grain. This quality faux wood prevents both warping and cracking with its durable pvc that looks and feels just like the real thing. It also features top quality components for a contemporary, modern edge, and decorative linen tapes for added designer detail. Craft a well-dressed dcor in the kitchen by including the fruitwood fine grain with walnut cabinets and coordinating lumber worktops.

products.title: Cotswold, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.

products.title: Kalmar, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar ridgeback is a subtly layered design that weaves woody browns and light stone greys together in perfect harmony. By finishing things off with light grey dashes that amplify the natural backdrop of the wooden grain it allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Turn the living room into the relaxing and homely space that you've always wanted by building your new colour scheme out from your windows.

products.title: Kalmar, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: A lighter finish always adds a more contemporary feel to a wood, and the kalmar in spanish cedar brings a classic edge through textured grain and a gentle polish. With high quality parts, and durable basswood, this blind also offers practicality by the bucketload. Finish off a clean and contemporary kitchen, with just a hint of country style, by incorporating the spanish cedar. White units will pair beautifully with wooden worktops, in a similar finish to that of the blind, and a refreshing duck egg blue will offset the look nicely.

products.title: Kalmar, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark wood makes for a classic feature in any room and the kalmar's jacobean oak is a real statement piece. The sturdy, quality basswood, which we source from only sustainable forests, is stained in a traditional dark oak, resulting in a window dressing that offers both style and class. The jacobean oak speaks for itself, so keep its surrounding decor clean and simple, painting the walls in a homely cream and choosing sofas to match.

products.title: Kalmar, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: Painted in light grey, and with a pretty shabby chic effect, the kalmar in pearl river will make a fashionable addition to any home. The quality basswood is responsibly sourced from sustainable forests, so you can be sure you're doing the right thing for the planet - as well as gaining a gorgeous blind for your home. Use the pearl river to craft a vintage theme in your study, opting for a dusky pink feature wall and painting the remaining walls in soft cream or barely-there grey-white.

products.title: Kalmar, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.

products.title: Kalmar, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony with the cool grey to create a visual that will capture your imagination. Transform the kitchen into the contemporary heart of the home that you have always wanted it to be by coordinating your countertops with cool grey.

products.title: Kalmar, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you want to add something that will take your interiors in a new direction. If you love to celebrate texture as part of your interior design efforts then contrasting iron mountain against a lightly stained wooden floor is one direction you could consider.

products.title: Kalmar, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowing grain this is one piece of design that is sure to turn heads. If you're looking to breathe new life into the dining room then windrift could be the breath of fresh air that you've been looking for.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look. Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic. Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping. Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.
